title: Account Stolen
body: So, the past week I have noticed that the RP that I have been buying with my money, is gone. I checked my gifting history and all my gifts are legendary skins to one of the people on my friends list. I would think this is a problem, what do I do? Please email me:  ---------

replies.body: I've removed your sensitive account information from your post for security reasons.  Reach out to us by filling out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team will look into this individually with you.  We'll reply back asap!
ask riot support but they will give you a list of account verification questions which i can't remember any, good luck! I had the same problem but they cant do anything.
